introduction: You can suggest a Community Payback project that would benefit your area - for example, removing graffiti and litter, clearing wasteland or decorating a public building.
more_information:
To suggest a project, you'll need to give:

- your contact details
- a specific location of the where the work could be carried out
- a description of what needs to be done

Once the form is completed, your local Probation Trust will contact you to let you know if your suggestion has been accepted.
overview: Suggest a Community Payback project that would benefit your area - eg removing graffiti and litter, clearing wasteland or decorating a public place or building
title: Nominate a Community Payback project
